response.original_title: Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood: Welcome to the Neighborhood
response.overview: Animated series, targeting ages 2-4, featuring the son of the original Daniel Tiger from Mr. Rogers Neighborhood. Little Daniel is a shy, but brave, 4-year-old tiger who lives in the beloved Neighborhood of Make-Believe, exploring the neighborhood and his school with his friends, viewing the ordinary as extraordinary. Episodes include - Daniel's Birthday/Daniel's Picnic, and Neighbor Day.
response.title: Daniel Tiger's Neighborhood: Welcome to the Neighborhood
